title: Child's Vest
description: blue lining; back in diamond patterned silk-like weave; front heavily embroidered in horizontal and vertical patterns of scrolled geometric embroidery; shades of red, blue, orange on black background; Neck edge and front edge bound in white with three knot and loop closures
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
